author: kanagwa
content: As potuz mentioned each rollup will have different encoding schemes. At Blobscan we will support decoding of blob data for the major rollups. Stay tunned.

author: beringela1311
content: Good thanks. Does blobscan offer a public API I can call without hosting my own nodes?

author: kanagwa
content: Hi <@457145137122902049> yes, we made it public recently. You can check it at: https://api.holesky.blobscan.com
